EmailTemplate.subject: Details of your role with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations on being appointed a summer staff member to work with The Challenge this summer.
Below are login details to our Staff website, where you will be able to access your When to be Where, a document which includes all the information you will need about where and when you are working with The Challenge.
Website: http://staff.the-challenge.org/ Username: {!Contact.Email} Login pin: {!Contact.Login_PIN__c}
You will be contacted by a member of the staffing team a week before your programme starts.
If you have any questions in the meantime, or have any difficulties accessing your information, please contact the Staffing department on summer2012@the-challenge.org.
We hope you have a very enjoyable summer with The Challenge.
Best wishes,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} The Challenge Network t: {!Contact.OwnerPhone} e: {!Contact.OwnerEmail}
